quote: Try to touch the past. Try to deal with the past. It's not real. It's just a dream.
author: Ted Bundy

quote: He who stops being better stops being good.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: The real strong have no need to prove it to phonies.
author: Charles Manson

quote: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Countless millions who have walked this earth before us have gone through this, so this is just an experience we all share
author: Ted Bundy

quote: Impossible is a word found only in the dictionary of fools.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate
author: Oprah

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Stay away from negative people, they have a problem for every solution
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you have the ability to love, love yourself first
author: Charles Bukwoski

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there
author: Teddy Roosevelt

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore
author: William Faulkner
